title: Soft peanut butter chocolate chip cookies
ingredients: ['225g butter, softened', '325g soft brown sugar', '2 eggs', '250g peanut butter', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '345g plain flour', '30g cornflour', '3/4 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1/2 teaspoon baking powder', '175g dark chocolate chips']
